favourite.article: Praise God in Jesus Name for this place of refuge. It has helped me this day so very much. I pray Our Lord pours out His blessings upon everyone who visits & reads these words, and also those who constructed this site. Shalom to you & Pray for the Peace of Jerusalem.

May God help us to surrender all to Him. As we have laid all on the altar of sacrifice, Oh God give us the grace to continue contending for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints in Jesus Name. Fill us with Thy love and Power, let Your blessings fall on us in the day and in the night in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

..Growing up in the Baptist Church brought to a place where we were grounded by many hymns including this one. With so rich content, this song and many other Hymnals would give a true definition of our Christian walk. Onward Christian soldiers....
Just wondering if this hymn is considered an invitational hymn?

One of the most beautiful hymns remembered from childhood! Precious Words reminding us that when we surrender all, He can then step in and change our lives around, empowering us to live a life well-pleasing to Him, Jesus, our precious Redeemer and Friend! Worldly pleasures can never compare with the joy found in serving Him and others.
To God be the glory.
In the name of Jesus I will be baptised because this song mean I have to give my life to Jesus.
Groly to His name.

The lyrics to this hymnal lifts my spirit very high. Father, in the previous name of Jesus, I can do nothing in my own power, however, if I surrender my will to do Your will I can do all things through Christ which strengthens me. I pray Your will be done.

Oh God help us to surrender all to Thee. As we have laid all on the altar of sacrifice, give us the grace to continue contending for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints in Jesus Name. Fill us with Thy love and Power, let Your blessings fall on us in the day and in the night in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Peace!!!
I surrender all unto Jesus and rededicate my life to Him afresh.
So many years I surrendered almost... It's time I do it fully. In Jesus name, Amen.
Lord I surrender all to You. Please take control.
I like this song!!!!!! It makes me to be strong in ma struggle.
The Lord is good and merciful. May His name be praised in Jesus name..
Lord I leave everything and I surrender to You. I want to be with You from today because I don't want to miss rapture.
This song is a blessing. It's like you're confessing to God. Lord I surrender all to You alone.
Love this song so much.
Lord You are the vine and Your father is the husbandman. So Lord I surrender myself to You so I can be connected to the vine.
Lord Jesus I have surrendered everything to You my God. I take this opportunity to thank You for everything in my life. Bless each and everyone who has commented here.
I LOVE THIS SONG! it is so sweet, and it really touches my heart!!!
Thank You Lord Jesus Christ. I have seen You fighting for me in my troubles. Please help me to surrender everything to You...You are my true God. Let the world know this.
On to Jesus I surrender all. Because I cannot do it...He is the only way. Please come unto Him for your peace and freedom.
Thank You God for making that provision through Jesus Christ for my cleansing.
I'm a branch, Lord, You are the Vine. Kindly hold my hand till the very end in Jesus name. Amen.

Lord help us to surrender all to Thee. As we have laid all on the altar of sacrifice, give us grace not to look back in Jesus Name. Fill us with Thy love and Power, let Your blessings fall on us in the day and in the night in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

Thank You Jesus for a moment of true worship. Today is my birthday and this song is a representation of my total surrender to You. Thank You Lord for bringing me this far in life for Your glory. Please give me a special birthday gift today Amen.
I surrender Lord, I can't anymore. Please fight our battles for us. I'm sorry that I tried to do it on my own. HELP us my FATHER, in JESUS NAME I pray, AMEN.

It is heart warming that at a time that all ones sees littering the internet is anti-Christ, God has touched some God fearing people to put such wonderful hymns in the net. God bless you and enrich your life with the joy and peace of the Lord. And may the Good Lord reward your labour of love in Jesus Mighty Name. Amen.

I thank You Lord Almighty for my life this far...................LORD You have never forskaen me in times of trouble............You always win my battles for me..........and I strongly believe You'll do it for me again and again. Father Lord, continue to strengthen me with Your Holy strength as I surrender all my life to You.
I surrender all to You Jesus. You are everything. You gave your life for me. I just want to say, Thank You.

Dear Lord Jesus, thank You for winning this battle for me. Thank You for showing my enemies that You are and will always be the King of Kings. Please give me peace and light the way for me, I surrender all I am to You my precious Father. Amen.
I love to hear this music so much, thanks for your website.

Lord, I surrender all! I am under so much pressure daily and I've tried to do it on my own, when I know I can't do anything without You. I give it all back and am so sorry. Please forgive me Dear Lord. I am nothing without You. You are my Lord and Savior and I surrender it all to You. I love You Jesus!
I surrender. The battle is too much for just me. Only with You do I have strength for the fight.
I love You Lord and thank You Lord for everything. You've opened my eyes.
This my prayer

Dear God - I give it all to You. All my worries. I cast my cares on You. I am so grateful for all the blessings You bestow on me. Help me to find my direction in life. I am so blessed to be able to surrender it all to You. I know You have a plan and I need to give You the controls. Help me to surrender it all to You. I love You Lord with all my heart, mind and soul. Amen!

Father, I joined in agreement in prayer with Your people as they reach with all their heart to You. May the eyes of their heart be enlighten to Your Spirit within and know Your Spirit is leading and directing their hearts in the way they should go. Thank You Lord for Your truth, Thy Word have I hid in my heart that I would not sin against You. You are everything, and it is finished...Christ has paid it all! In Jesus Name, Amen!

I surrender to You Oh Lord; thank You for Your grace at this troubling time. I feel Your presence; Your Holy Spirit rests upon my heart. I pray for Your guidance and I pray that I may feel Your hand upon my shoulder.

I surrender all to You my Lord n Savior Jesus Christ. Lord help me to keep my mind stayed on You when trials and tribulations come and when things seem to be going well not puff myself up but give You all the praise. Holy Spirit lead me and guide me to hear Your voice to Love others help others as You want me to do. In Jesus name Amen.

Lord I give myself to Thee. As have laid all on the altar of sacrifice, give me grace not to look back in Jesus Name. Fill us with Thy love and Power, let Your blessings fall on us in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
All to You I surrender, my Savior.
If not for Jesus, where will I've been? I surrender to You Jesus.
Thank You for Your unconditional love, sweet Jesus.
All to You my Saviour I surrender all. Look on me with pity and mercy and forgive me.

Dearest Lord Jesus, I want to surrender all to You! Everything inside me, all my heart, my whole self surrendered to You! I want You to be Lord over me! I trust You Jesus to enable me to be completely surrendered. I place my all on Your altar allowing You to divide soul and spirit. Hebrews 4:12 in Your precious name, Amen.
Lord open my being to You! Come in, fill me with the Spirit.
I surrender myself to You Lord. Take me and fill me with Your Holy Spirit. Thanks for the lyrics.
With Jesus I am always a winner.
Jesus thank You for giving me the privilege to be my Saviour. For the rest of my life I will always remain surrendered to You my loving Saviour.

Lord Jesus, thank You for Your grace to surrender all! Thank You for the trials which You so lovingly allow in my life to enable me to surrender all to You! You, Lord Jesus are worthy to be surrendered to! I belong to You, Jesus. Is.44:5 Amen

I surrender everything to Jesus because I cannot do it on my own. I need His help. He loves me and I love Him too. He died for me so I will live for Him. The great tribulation is coming soon and if I get left behind I will not take the mark of the beast and become a martyred saint. For me to live is Christ and to die is gain. For me to live is Christ means that when you are living on this earth follow Jesus and not Satan and to die is gain means that when people persecute you such as kill you, tell lies on you and say you are a liar, a thief or a fornicator and a murderer when they know you are not great is your eternal reward in Heaven in Jesus name. Amen.
Yes, to Jesus we Surrender! Our path to holiness and salvation goes through Mama Mary to Jesus! In all eternity I'll belong to You my dear Jesus <3

Thank you Tom for your response to Jim. It is God who has started a good work in us and will complete it. Thank God for HIS faithfulness! Philippians 1:6 "Being confident of this very thing, that He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:" Hebrews 12:2 "Looking unto Jesus the AUTHOR AND FINISHER OF OUR FAITH; who for the joy that was set before Him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God."
I was once lost but now am found...I need Your grace to run this race, O Lord...I surrender all oh Lord....I love Jesus.
To God be the glory. He is a wonderful God. A merciful God and near Him is safe..

so, I checked the meaning of "surrender" and the definitions strikes me.. stop resisting to an opponent... I end up making God my enemy when I don't surrender.. like He is always there demanding I let Him take charge while I stubbornly tell Him I can do it on my own and keep failing. I just want to surrender all now and stop worrying and I know I will be so relieved to the extent I will feel so foolish for not surrendering all this while. thanks Jesus.. forgive my stubbornness
Jesus bless me, my family, my country this whole world that we all may surrender ourselves fully at thy Holy feet.
This hymn makes me acknowledge the fact that my assignments and all that concerns me isn't mine and that it belongs to Jesus and since Jesus never fails I can never fail.

This comment is for Jim who honestly said below that he is unable to surrender all. Brother Jim this is true for all of us. This is why we need the wonderful Christ living in us. If you will tell Jesus that you are completely unable to do this, but that you trust Him to do it for you, you will find yourself completely surrendered and you will not understand how it happened. Just trust Him totally. He will fulfill ALL of Gods requirements on your behalf. Trust that He will do this. Your trust sets God into action.
A powerful hymn. Hymns are always good inspirational songs.
The total submission alone can make us to see the powerful action of God in our lives. Thanks a lot for uploading it.
@oyamenda: God's able and abundantly able to do more than You can think say or imagine. This song LET YOUR LIVING WATER FLOW OVER MY SOUL would do wonders in your situation.
If God can change my HIV status to negative, I will serve Him for the rest of my life, now I see that God's words are truth.
Please God I surrender all to You now and never to pick it again in Jesus name Amen. Help me Lord.

I surrender all. If I only could. Someday when I meet Him, He will give me everything I need to surrender all. Now I surrender all I can. And I pray every day for Him to take what I can't let go of. I love You Lord. Surrender me all. Amen.
These songs are wonderful and I thank you, are a blessing to me, are a blessing to my mind and I thank God for you.
I surrender to You my Lord, pls help me work in You.
I surrender all to You my God.

J. W. Van De Venter was a schoolteacher by profession but an artist at heart. Teaching school allowed him to make a living while he continued his study of drawing and painting. After evangelistic meetings in his church, friends saw his gifts in counseling and working with people and urged him to become an evangelist. For 5 years he wavered between his love of art and what seemed to be God's calling him to evangelistic ministry. He later recalled, "At last the pivotal hour of my life came and I surrendered all. A new day was ushered into my life. I became an evangelist and discovered down deep in my soul a talent hitherto unknown to me." A few years later, Van De Venter, remembering that decisive moment, wrote this hymn. - Great Songs of Faith by Brown & Norton
I solemnly surrender!
Ever I want to surrender to Your will from today and evermore for I'm quicken and lively when I hear Thee.
This song brings me to my knees every time I listen to it.

It hit me hard! It's almost too good to be true! ONLY God could do this! This one- sided love is beyond comprehension without revelation! That when I was lost and in Satan's grip God loved me. How could He get me back? I was so precious to Him that though He owns 'the cattle on a thousand hills', He found them insufficient to pay for me. So He had to give up His most priceless possession, His Son (This is the ONLY limitation God ever had - He didn't have anything more precious than His Son Jesus) to die for me to pay the debt for my redemption! And all this, when I didn't know a thing! Now that I know, what a wonder! What can I give in return? Nothing, because I own nothing except all He has given me. So at His feet I surrender them all! He is worth more than a trillion of them. Take all, Lord Jesus. I worship You!
I love the hymn. It's a source of inspiration for me! God bless you...
I love this song because it brings me to the presence of the Most High Jehovah, God and lifts my spirit.
I love this song because this song brings you in an attitude of worship.

It has been said 'you can Obey without Surrendering... but you cannot Surrender without Obeying.' This song reminds me of this truth and the beautiful communion with God when He sees the full surrender of my heart to Him!

Indeed, unto Jesus my Savior, I truly surrender. Lord, please touch my heart and make me a truly changed person as I absorb myself in these Heavenly tunes. Keep resourcing such works to touch as many wandering souls (like mine) as possible and have their lives turned around in the favor of Your gospel. Amen.
I love this song. It touches me very much and it makes me see that I am close to Jesus Christ our Savior.
Playing the music and singing along after my meditation this morning has lifted me up and drawn me closer to my God. May the Lord bless the sponsor(s). Amen.

This song has strengthened my testimony every time I listen to it. It always reminds me of how blessed I have been since I surrendered my life to Jesus. Jesus wants us to surrender our situations unto Him, and we will receive the Peace and Joy that He wants us to have.
Shalom!!! I'm just a man after God's own heart. God loves you! Always has always will! Jesus is Lord of all. I surrender all to Jesus.
I thank God because each time I sing this song my life does receive the touch of God.

Seeking communion (aiming to please Him, having an intimate relationship and fully understanding and trusting Him) with God should at the very most be the first purpose of a Christian here on earth. For a believer to maximize his or hers full potential, laying hold of the gifts and opportunities availed to them by God, it would be wise for one to know for what purpose we are serving Him. We are all created differently (fearfully and wonderfully), but for what reason? Every person is assigned his or her own place in the Divine Plan in Christ. Daniel 11:32b â€“ Those who know their God shall be strong and do mighty exploits. The second aim for every Christian is to bare fruits of the same kind. Sharing the Good News that Jesus Christ is alive and alive forever more, bringing people to repentance, so that they may also share in the same communion with God as every Christian. To be a fruitful branch, blossoming and giving fruit in its full potential. This is what the Christian life is all about.

This song has become my prayer! I am reading an old book by E. Stanley Jones, Victory Through Surrender, through which I have become inspired to surrender my life to Jesus. So may I be able to say with Saint Paul, "For me to live is Christ!"
In His Presence I Daily Live.... Every day let Christ live in us and through us...
No words to express what good this does to me. It's my catalyst in moments of worship. God bless hymnal.net.
The Lord bless you for making available online classic hymns. I came across your site when searching for hymns on the internet.
Very inspiring song. Lord, as I surrender all to You search me and help me walk in the way everlasting. Ps. 139:23-24
Beautiful song. Renewed my faith in my Lord.
Amen! To Jesus I surrender! Jesus, thank You for Your love, I love You!

When the gospel came to me, it unveiled the wonderful Person, Jesus Christ, and His unique work. As this Word of Christ entered my heart, it evoked the twofold response of faith and love toward Him. Mary desired Him as the one thing as she listened to His word (Luke 10:39,42), then broke and poured forth all she had on Him (Mark 14:3). May the faith that connects me to Him increase, and my love that surrenders all be continually poured upon Him.

9 months ago I fell to my knees and repented to God. I told Him I was tired of this miserable world of sin and I didn't want to SIN ANY MORE. I told Him I would give up everything. I just wanted to be saved. I just wanted to be free for real, and on June 5, 2009, God saved me. For 9 months I have been living a life free from all willfully committed sin by the grace of God. I depend solely on Him and put all my trust in Him and He guides me each and everyday. He has renewed my mind, body, and soul. I am a living sacrifice for Him. I am His servant. I have decided to follow Jesus. No turning back. I have made up my mind. I'm going to live for Jesus. I give Him my all because He is everything to me. So I totally despise sin. I hate it. Sin is exceedingly sinful to me. I will live spotless and blameless in this world. Living a life free from sin, I am able to have that true connection, that beautiful realtionship that I so longed for. He supplies my every need. He is so faithful. I know He will stay the same forever. I love God with all my heart, soul, mind and strength. I surrender all. :)
I am strong through Christ who strengthens me. This song moved me to get saved at a very tender age. I surrender all to Him. Amen.
Oh surrender!

Hello to everybody. This is for all if one of you listen to this song and you try to know what it means, this means all nations should bow down before God and Jesus and to surrender all to Him because He has the power on His hands, He controls everything, He overcame death, He promised us a life; the eternal life. Bye and God bless all that read this comment.
A great song, I recollect my granny (who's no more) with this song. She used to praise and sing this.
Wonderful song with touching lyrics and meaning. This is a song that touched my life.
Oh that we would surrender all to Christ. How sweet, how sweet.
This is an amazing song; the song which gives a new begining, new life,a joyous and glorious salvation. I love this song.
JESUS, I love You. All I have is Yours, Yours I am, Yours I want to be. Do with me whatever You, please. AMEN.
Let us thank the Lord Jesus Christ because He died in our stead! We have nothing to say but surrender ourselves to Him and love Him the way He loves us! AMEN!
Amen to the Lord Jesus! I surrender my all to you!
Worldly pleasures all forsaken; Take me, Jesus, take me now... How I love to say this! Oh Lord Jesus, I SURRENDER ALL!
This song reminds me of a time in my life when I finally made a decision to give my life to this blessed Saviour. I can see that it was the best decision ever. Thank You Jesus!
I love this song. It reinforces what I ought to do in good times and in difficult times. THANK YOU JESUS! You love us despite our unworthiness.
I love this song.. LORD ... bless each one who hears this song
I sang this song in a solo performance day recently. I love this song and what the lyrics mean.
I love this song we sing it all the time at my church. I like to play it on my piano.

I received the Holy Spirit with the evidence of speaking in Tongues. Was baptised by full immersion in water. I thank the Lord Jesus for His sacrifice thus setting me free from the sorrow and sadness of this dying world. I will be with Him when He returns.

What can I say but all the praise and thanks to my Father I gave to Him. It's time for me to surrender my life to Him. In fact, He is my great Savior. He didn't save Himself on the cross, He saved us. I have nothing to give but to surrender my whole being to Him. I love You, Lord Jesus. You've loved me to the uttermost.

If there is a bad man I am, despite that fact of being the chief of sinners Christ took me up and I am now His so I surrender all to Him. It's my prayer and awe of Calvary that makes me shout the prayer I surrender all.
